subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Rutherienne continued a four-race winning streak, capturing yesterday’s $100,000-added Lake George for 3-year-old fillies at Saratoga Race Course. Ridden by Garrett Gomez, the bay filly ran the one-and-one-sixteenth mile on the turf in 1 minute 40.34 seconds.Rutherienne raced well behind the front-runners early, then found running room on the rail midstretch and came through under strong urging from Gomez to win by a head. Rutherienne held off a late push by Lady Attack, who was ridden by Calvin Borel. Sharp Susan was third.
